content: by aquaknits for sknitches http //aquaknits factotum23 com/index php/archives/175 make a splash with these super simple lacey rib socks that knit up in record time size to fit a women s size 9 foot the rib pattern makes these socks pretty stretchy and they will fit up a 9 - 9 5 circumference leg materials yarn 1 skein of sknitches big tryst 250yds/228m in color cinnamon teal duck or similar sport weight/ dk yarn abbreviations needles a set of 4 us#3 3 25 mm dpns stitch marker k2tog knit 2 stitches together tapestry needle for weaving in ends p2tog purl 2 stitches together yo yarn over gauge 6 sts per inch in st st ssk slip slip knit sl 1 k1 psso slip 1 k1 pass slipped stitch over 1 directions stitch patterns cast on 48 sts and divide between 3 needles join for working rib pattern in the round work in rib pattern for 1 round 1 *k5 p2 k3 p2* repeat to end leg repeat every round begin with round 1 of leg lace pattern work in pattern for 10 repeats ending with round 1 to begin your leg lace pattern heel flap rnds 1 3 *k5 p2 k3 p2* round 4 *k2tog yo k1 yo sl 1 k1 heel flap psso p2 k3 p2* repeat to end heel flap is worked back and forth over 25 sts row 1 remove marker knit in rib pattern for 21 sts turn row 2 sl 1 knit sts as they appear knit the knits and purl the purls across 24 sts turn place remaining 23 sts on hold repeat row 2 every row continuing to slip the first st and knitting or purling sts as they appear until heel flap measures approx 2 5 inches heel turn r1 rs sl 1 k12 ssk k1 turn r2 ws sl 1 p4 p2tog p1 turn r3 sl 1 k to within 1 st before gap ssk k1 turn r4 sl 1 p to within 1 st before gap p2tog p1 turn repeat row 3 and 4 until 15 sts remain there will be 1 more decrease left on the rs gusset rs sl k12 k2tog pick up and knit 12 sts along edge of heel flap this will now be needle #1 needle 2 work round 2 of leg lace pattern across all the held sts needle 3 pick up and knit12 sts along other side of heel flap edge knit 7 sts from needle 1 onto new needle 3 now the beginning of the round is at the center of the heel 2 gusset decreases next round needle 1 k to last 3 sts k2tog k1 needle 2 continue with leg lace pattern needle 3 k1 ssk k to end repeat this round until there are 12 sts each on needles 1 and 3 48 sts total foot continue knitting in st st for needles 1 and 3 while working lace leg pattern across needle 2 until foot is 2 inches
